records.location_details: Libyan Search and Rescue Region (SRR), Maltese SRR
records.note_contesto: Two migrants were subjected to ill-treatment and violence by at least three crew members of a Libyan vessel during a rescue operation in the Maltese SRR. The violence included slapping, kicking, hitting, holding, pushing, and causing one migrant to fall on the deck. The Fundamental Rights Office expressed concern over these instances of violence and the potential for serious violations of fundamental rights.
records.evidenza_testuale: reported instances of violence against two (2) migrants by at least three (3) crew members of the Libyan vessel
